releaseLinks.label: 27th July, 2022
releaseLinks.description: Rethought our <Columns /> component, improved many of our components to handle colours more consistently, and introduced @babel/runtime as a dependency for most packages.

releaseLinks.label: 28th June, 2022
releaseLinks.description: New branding for Department of Agriculture, Fisheries and Forestry. New Switch and Pagination component. Various bug fixes and improvements.

releaseLinks.label: 15th June, 2022
releaseLinks.description: Added support for React 18. Various bug fixes and improvements.

releaseLinks.label: May 30th, 2022
releaseLinks.description: Add ButtonGroup component. Various bug fixes and improvements.

releaseLinks.label: April 28th, 2022
releaseLinks.description: Add HeroBanner and Loading. Various bug fixes and improvements.

releaseLinks.label: April 1st, 2022
releaseLinks.description: Add DatePicker, Modal and Table. Various bug fixes and improvements.

releaseLinks.label: March 23rd, 2022
releaseLinks.description: Added PageAlert, new tone colours, bug fixes and improvements.

releaseLinks.label: March 16th, 2022
releaseLinks.description: Updated Icon API, new components, bug fixes and improvements.

releaseLinks.label: March 3rd, 2022
releaseLinks.description: Add InPage Nav. Bug fixes and improvements

releaseLinks.label: February 23rd, 2022
releaseLinks.description: Add new form and interactive components

releaseLinks.label: January 7th, 2022
releaseLinks.description: Changes to improve usability of primitive components and to better enable using framework provided link components.

releaseLinks.label: January 5th, 2022
releaseLinks.description: Initial release. This is the first release of the upcoming Agriculture Design-System components.
